Software is a central player for inventory both for what an organization consumes from other organizations och what produces itself.

== Description ==
The [http://www.wbemsolutions.com/tutorials/CIM/cim-model-app.html DMTF] model for software isn't as straightforward as [http://ant.apache.org/ivy Ivy] terminology and unfortunately mixes in services (in terms of features) too early.  Ivy is great for looking at software as inventory and dependencies between software.
